activities.title: Lego Tower Challenge
activities.description: Teams compete to build the tallest or most creative tower using Legos.

category.title: Communication
category.description: Activities that strengthen team communication, active listening, and group problem-solving.

activities.title: Speed Networking
activities.description: Quick one-on-one chats to help team members get to know each other better.

category.title: Trust Building
category.description: Exercises that build trust, empathy, and deeper personal connections among team members.

category.title: Fun
category.description: Light, engaging activities that boost energy, morale, and create shared fun experiences.

activities.title: Storytelling Relay
activities.description: Team builds a story sentence by sentence, each person adding to the plot.
